TopicTitle: Can't select any pad from the KK menu.

Articles.Content:
Hey!

Recently I added some new mods to my collection, for example CanaveralPads with the LC39 pad, I installed it through CKAN, so any other required mods are installed as well (I checked it). But when I want to select launch pad from theKerbal Konstructor menu in VAB, I can't do it, simply there is nothing here except KSC LaunchPad. Anyone know  the reason?

The new launchpads are probably closed and you are only seeing open pads. Use KK's Launcexcrementse Selector window, 2nd button from the left, to toggle display of closed pads. You'll then be able to click on closed pads to open them.

A less likely cause, if you have multiple KSP instances in different folders, is that you updated the wrong copy of KSP with CKAN.

 

Edited September 20, 2021 by DeadJohn
